title: SinBad.io
author: SinBad.io
created_time: January 04, 2023, 02:34:49 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 02:45:27 PM by SinBad.io
content: Two weeks ago we launched a design contest to find a good signature and avatar set for Sinbad.io signature campaign. The winner to win $250Contest : Bitcoin Mixer Sinbad Signature and Avatar Set Design. üèÜ Win $250Signature campaign: SINBAD MIXER Signature & [Avatar] Campaign. Up-to $130/w | RevisedIn the contest we received total of 4 entry. Now we want your help to find our winner. The nominees are:rat03gopohjulerz12jaycehahay1. Who is your winner?Vote please. Highest number will be our winner.2. Just because you are helping us, we would like to reward $20 to one user.Let us know what will be the last three digits of bitcoin block #771350Example block #770340 winner 72600000000000000000000aa7c6b39f16d5b8a156ff6e52f20e109382faae2726bExample block #770339 winner 780000000000000000000038c42546f62a4c24bf841519d80147982d6a3abb7d80eHow to join?Post the following information:Code:Your vote for:Last three digit of block #771350betch32 address:Rules:One entry per members, no alt accounts are allowedYour must submit your entry before #771349th block was minedMinimum 50 activity to joinAccount registered after 1st December 2022 can not join.You can not edit the entry once posted.If a 3 digit sequence is taken already then the same sequence posted later by another member will not be accepted.The closest one will be the winner if not all 3 digits match.Sinbad.io team keeps the right to reject any entry or terminate the game anytime.Good luck!Sinbad.ioProtecting Your PrivacyTor: http://[directing people to darknet sites is not allowed].onion/Telegram English: http://t.me/sinbadio_englishTelegram Russian: http://t.me/sinbadio_russian

comments.body: My vote goes toCode:Your vote for: rat03gopohLast three digit of block #771350: 756betch32 address: 3CrySAp8G1PfvjrYT4HPQhE8MouBKWd9WBQuote from: NeuroticFish on January 04, 2023, 02:38:37 PMQuote from: SinBad.io on January 04, 2023, 02:34:49 PMLet us know what will be the last three digits of bitcoin block #771350What happens if for example you'll have 20 participants and neither of them guesses those 3 digits?One idea would be to get the number of consecutives blocks until a winner is found.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: This is a tough one to be honest, if only all three could be rewarded in some way looking at how many participants submitted their entries , however a winner must be chosen. @rat03gopoh has the right colors which allow the signature to pop out while @jayce has that sig that tells the story through the picture(graphics) and for this I will go with....Code:Your vote for: jayceLast three digit of block #771350: 123betch32 address:bc1q6pm0afcphvqp594fgna8u63gza37qkrm3wvf0s

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: SinBad.io on January 04, 2023, 02:34:49 PM1. Who is your winner?Vote please. Highest number will be our winner.I vote for jayce's design:QuotejayceQuote2. Just because you are helping us, we would like to reward $20 to one user.Let us know what will be the last three digits of bitcoin block #771350I'll choose 000. I assume the "nearest" wraps around, right? So if the number is 001, I'm closest, but if it's 999, I hope I can also be closest Although this is much more fun:Quote from: bitmover on January 04, 2023, 03:18:23 PMQuote from: NeuroticFish on January 04, 2023, 02:38:37 PMQuote from: SinBad.io on January 04, 2023, 02:34:49 PMLet us know what will be the last three digits of bitcoin block #771350What happens if for example you'll have 20 participants and neither of them guesses those 3 digits?One idea would be to get the number of consecutives blocks until a winner is found.Quote from: SinBad.io on January 04, 2023, 02:34:49 PMHow to join?Okay, proper format:Code:Your vote for: jayceLast three digit of block #771350: 000bech32 address: bc1qwazdacdtxz3mc0ze86t62xe0dufpa90ac4naza
